storyInfo: Ifrit brings Rosmontis under control. The Doctor sees the sarcophagus. Silence and Saria pass by each other. The laboratory takes off roaring.

attributes.content: Cut. Cut the potato open, and put it into the water piece by piece. Skulls are much harder to cut.
Tear. The softest tissues in the human body are like cotton candy, easily scattered by a gloved hand.
Crush. Flowers are crushed in the trembling palm, the juices sticking to the skin, dripping onto new leather shoes.
Scream. The instruments sever the nerves so quickly that it can take a life without its owner noticing, just like the use of anesthetics.
Cry. My dead brothers cry on the operating table. Why were they the ones who had to be killed? Why was I the one who was made to live?
No. No.
They are not dead yet. They are behind me, hammering and crying.
There was never a garden. There was only cruel imprisonment and cutting, the cage that treated our lives like toys.
They want to destroy the cage.
As do I.
The lab walls are being torn apart? They're made of advanced reinforced materials... how they be sliced apart like potatoes?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Rosmontis.;She's lost control.;That's what I was most afraid of.

attributes.content: Th-The ground is being peeled like an apple!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: We'll be crushed into pulp!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Amiya could calm Rosmontis down. But she's not here.;I'll try...

attributes.content: You don't mean you're going by yourself, do you?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Did you see how she shredded that power armor like paper? You're just a regular human! You are human, right?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: True blue flesh and blood.;......;Then I won't leave Rosmontis behind.

attributes.content: ...I'll go.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: This is no time for jokes, Iffy!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The DiÎ±blo within you... well, your power is plenty dangerous too. Don't tell me you mean to...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I won't use its power. I'll do it myself.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: That's a promise between me and Rosmontis.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Requesting... support...
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: The communicator... it's crushed?
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: What the heck are...
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: Don't.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Power Armor Operator

attributes.content: I know what you want to say. Don't say it.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: She's my friend. My good friend.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: We're more than friends. We work together and fight together.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Rosmontis...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: ...I'll destroy everything that's not right.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: A lab like this...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It should never have existed.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I get it.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Damned lab coats, damned labs, all those damned things that tormented us should have been burned to ashes a long time ago!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Of course we have the right to be angry, to yell, to destroy it all!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: But we don't have to do it!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Are you going to stand in the way of what's right?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You're tough... but it'll take more than that to stop me!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I won't let you become like Darya, Rosmontis... we promised to see the city together, and go back to Rhodes Island together!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I don't want to admit it, but you've always been better than I am! You're an elite operator, and you've done so many amazing things.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Think of Amiya, think of Blaze the big cat, think of the Doctor! They have soft palms, their clothes smell clean, and they hug like warm blankets!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Blankets...?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: There are people who love us. Life isn't fair, but after all the scum we had to put up with, we still ended up meeting some really good people.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Silence's stories always have a happy ending. I know, she made up a bunch of them.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Saria is always strict about my homework, but she helps me up when I fall down.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Don't destroy these memories.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You can stop now, Rosmontis.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Stop...?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I-Ifri...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: The vibrations weaken.
Ifrit grabs Rosmontis' hand.
Yes, Ifrit. You remember me. No way you could forget. You didn't find out I ate those cookies you hid yet.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Yes... I think you're right.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It wasn't the Doctor who ate the cookies. I should correct the terminal entry.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Hahah... hahahaha!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You look like you're hurting. Why are you laughing?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I want to laugh.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You didn't lose control, right? Even the Doctor was worried about it. But you just wanted to do what you wanted to do in your own way.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: ...Yeah.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: It's okay, Saria's worried that I'll lose control too. It's not a lack of trust. They just worry too much.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: As for the bad guys... the power they planted in us, the scars they left behind, none of that can control us.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: We're the only ones who can.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: We can turn the tables and laugh in their faces.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Like... like this?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Yes. Lift the corners of your mouth, find that Loken, and tell him he's nothing to you!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: ...Loken.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Alright, I'll find him. I know what to say now.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...Things have calmed down.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Ifrit did it. She calmed Rosmontis down. Talk about a close one...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Rosmontis's Arts left cracks in the walls around you.
The walls of the maze have been destroyed, revealing a hallway deeper into the building.

attributes.options: What is that room for, Muelsyse?;I see...

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: Why is there a vivarium in H.A.M.H.R.R.?;It's connected to Loken's lab.

attributes.content: Kristen remembered...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: 'Sarcophagus.'
You are sure you saw the Sarcophagus.
It is unmistakable. It is the starting point of all memories you have.
Even the dizziness is exactly the same.

attributes.options: Loken is helping Kristen study the sarcophagus?;What does Kristen need the sarcophagus for?
Does she want to destroy herself?;She'll turn into a strange, white-furred creature!

attributes.content: Muelsyse does not answer.
You reach out and touch nothing.
There is only a small splash, the reflection of bubbles.
The real Muelsyse stands at the heart of the vivarium.
Doctor... I promised to take you and Rosmontis to see Loken.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Our cooperation is over, now that its goal is complete.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: You can't go any further. We say goodbye here.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.options: You planned this from the beginning.
That's how you got the address.

attributes.content: I lied again. I really am evil, aren't I?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: That hard-head, Nasti... I told her I made my choice, when I really hadn't.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I only just now made it, the moment I saw this vivarium.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I came only to confirm one thing... yes, this is where my dreams are. The vivarium and the future it carries... this is my dream.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: It's the answer for me and my people.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Kristen promised to take it with her.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: She didn't lie to me. She just didn't tell me... maybe she got tired of my cloaks and daggers, how a part of me never seems to be there. Maybe she never stopped believing in the trust between us.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: She really did it...
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: So I should keep my promise.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Tell Saria... I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The water pushes you away. It is soft, but irresistible.
You return to the outer hallway, the lab doors closing before you.
The water disappears, leaving no trace behind. Your hand is empty again, but this is no longer just an intermission in the middle of a dance.
It's time. Can I go now?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: The deal is done. You can leave at any time.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: You promised me...
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You'll find it on your terminal.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Is this the entirety of Loken's research?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: No, there's another address... a blurred one. It looks familiar. You've really done a lot right under Maylander's nose. I'm starting to actually respect you.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: What a shame.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: What's that?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: You won't see the sky that you should have gotten to see.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: The stars? My people have played with them long enough. I've given you all the information I should. Do you really think those twisted spots of light are worth looking at?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: No, not the sky we see today.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Its true aspect, in the future.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Enough. I know about your great plans, but that future doesn't belong to me. As long as your data is legit, I'll be able to fulfill my ancestors' dream and recover my true powerâ
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: The power that you desire could not even overcome time. You understand that it could be machines that fly the skies of the future, or other evolving lifeforms...
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: But not a shadow from ten thousand years ago.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Are you mocking me... mocking my blood, my memory, my destiny?
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Youâ
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Sacrificing your entire race just to return to the past... is it really worth it?
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Whatever. I've got what I wanted. Let's say goodbye in peace.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: Ho'olheyak jumps down the monitoring platform.
She does not turn around to look at Kristen. She does not want Kristen to see the look on her face.
You.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: We meet again.
attributes.name: Ho'olheyak

attributes.content: They are silent for a moment.
Past and future pass by each other, without making contact.
I can't get the door open!
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It's... the weapon you lent me?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Not lent. Gave. It's yours. You just need practice.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Practice... er...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're free, once you go out from here. The agents and soldiers are too busy to bother. They've found H.A.M.H.R.R. and achieved their goal. They won't bother you anymore.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Run to Trimounts. There, you'll still be Researcher Silence.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You want to go in the most dangerous direction, don't you? You could put your life in danger. You may never be able escape Maylander's gaze ever again.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: It'll be a struggle of a lifetime. You may lose some things forever. Freedom, the life you know, the trust of your family and friends, the right to live under the sun, and yourself.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Are you sure you want a life like that?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I don't know. I haven't seen the problem resolved with my own eyes. I don't want to give up halfway.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're a talented scholar, a good doctor. Have you made up your mind to become a warrior?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Maybe I'll never be a warrior.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But I'll grasp the weapon you gave me tight, if necessary.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Very well, child. Go forth with my blessing.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Thank you, Director Jara.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: By the way, Control... Kristen could be just ahead.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Don't you want to see her?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Do I? Of course I do.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: But I doubt I can catch her.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Jara gazes at the laboratory.
Then, she turns her gaze toward the sky.
You got it yet?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Not yet!
attributes.name: Columbian Soldier

attributes.content: Keep going. The core of H.A.M.H.R.R. should be in here.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: And Kristen... she couldn't have escaped right under our noses.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: ...Ifrit?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Saria! Did you find a way in?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Not yet.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: This place is weird. Even after Rosmontis crushed most of the outer wall like a cookie, it's not revealing any of the stuff inside.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: ...It's not a complete building.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You're right, Ifrit. It's not a lab.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: This is... it's...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Did she install her parents' propulsion device on... how could it be? No... how did I not think of it until now?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Saria! Where are you going?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: If I break the wall...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: She must have expected me. It's pointless.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Then what has a point?
You can't change anything.
Would we be too late?
No.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I have to...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Have to what?
Saria.
Si...lence?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You need to get out of here... it could be...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Saria, I didn't come here to listen to you talk like that.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I know how far a scientist would go for her dream. I know that feeling of rapture, which is why I know the strength it takes to fight it with morality.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You've long been seeking a balance between science and order. You do well; perhaps too well.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Your order is falling apart. But if you're willing to let balance go... perhaps you'll find your roots amidst the chaos.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Find my... roots?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I believe you can.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: We have all things to do. Let's part here.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I can tell you now, Saria.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.text: How much I looked up to you.
How much I wanted to walk by your side.

attributes.content: Well, there goes a rare friend.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: How do you plan on making it up to me, Kristen?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Narcissa... You've returned. Are you ready to pronounce judgment?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Yes, I want to kill you.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Not for revenge. I hate you, but Amiya and the Doctor both say that revenge won't bring back the ones I love.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Not for destruction. You want to use me to destroy you. I won't. I'm not your weapon.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You're just a criminal. You're nothing to me.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I'll do what the law and prison could not do.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I hereby sentence you to death.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Good... good.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: How does that song go again?
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Country roadsâª Take me homeâª
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: To the place I belongâª
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Soon. Very soon.
attributes.name: Loken

attributes.content: Severe tremors shake the earth.
Like something very strong and resilient is about to break out.
You gaze at the rising inner corridor, and see a figure through the windows.
Kristen.
A name that has been on many lips these days.
Lunatic. Genius. Foe. Friend.
Or perhaps a dreamer who does not belong to this time.
You see her with your own eyes for the first time. She continues to look up at the sky, as though the blank emptiness is the only thing she should care about.

attributes.options: What is going on?;You cannot remain on your feet!

attributes.content: A familiar silhouette appears.
Mon3tr!
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Screeches)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: It unfolds in an instant, grabbing your shoulders lightly with sharp claws, the massive figure covering you fully.
Then, an even more massive shadow rises behind Mon3tr.
H.A.M.H.R.R..
Now you can see that the mysterious ring corridor and Muelsyse's vivarium are both part of H.A.M.H.R.R..
Maylander and the military fought over it, then made peace over it, but no one could have predicted that it would reveal itself in this way.
The bright flames of the thrusters feel blinding. The blast throws you off your feet.
If not for Kal'tsit and Mon3tr, you would have been cast to the winds, like those around you, and the broken remains of the lab.
Hang on, Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: I saw the 'Sarcophagus.';I didn't know Kristen's lab could fly.
We were so close to the truth...

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The figure in the air casts her gaze at you.
No, not at you. The dark monster that is protecting you.
(Growls)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Kristen moves her lips, seemingly inquiringly.
You hear Kal'tsit repeat her answer to you.
âI know.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
